display_long_description:
Immersive Gameplay
The core mechanic of Puzzle 360 revolves around rotating and aligning fragmented 3D pieces to form a complete image. In VR, this puzzle-solving experience feels incredibly intuitive and engaging. Using the Meta Quest controllers, you can grab, spin, and inspect each piece from all angles, which feels far more immersive and tactile compared to a standard 2D puzzle game.

Visuals and Design
The graphics in Puzzle 360 are vibrant and sharp, creating visually pleasing puzzles that feel rewarding to complete. Each puzzle transforms from a scattered collection of 3D fragments into a cohesive image, often showcasing beautiful artwork, intricate scenes, or complex objects. The VR environment adds depth to the visuals, making each completed puzzle feel like a mini art piece you’ve brought to life.


⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ / 5
